entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 16 except minus 21 in a few localities.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 16 except minus 21 in a few localities. Wind chill minus 24 this evening. Forecast issued 7:46 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:46 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 7:46 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
